summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department, accepting easements for the fire hydrants, water meters, watermains and combinations thereof with all appurtenances over portions of Pettit's Lake Washington Acre Tracts; Section 36, Township 24 North, Range 3 East, W.M.; Fisher's Highway Garden Tracts No. 2; and Section 5, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M. (Private Contracts - Brown et al.)
